title: Favourite Avicus Gamemode?!

replies.body: KoTH and CTF when they come. CTW as for now
replies.body_tagged: KoTH and CTF when they come. CTW as for now

replies.body: CTF, 5CP (cuz it relies on team coordination and pvp) and DTM (DTM cuz it allows a player to play any position and get creative with tactics and such, considering im all arounder thats what i gotta say)
replies.body_tagged: CTF, 5CP (cuz it relies on team coordination and pvp) and DTM (DTM cuz it allows a player to play any position and get creative with tactics and such, considering im all arounder thats what i gotta say)

replies.body: Skywars. If you don't count that then CTW. When Atlas comes out it will be a different gamemode :)
replies.body_tagged: Skywars. If you don't count that then CTW. When Atlas comes out it will be a different gamemode :)
